name: Viktor, a Steampunk Adventure
description: "Viktor, a Steampunk Adventure" is a comedy adventure game set in a cartoonish steampunk world. The story follows Viktor, a wild boar who tries to cope with the loss of his job by going on a quest to become a new Emperor of Austria-Hungary.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp or newer Processor: SSE2 instruction set support, generally everything made since 2004 should work Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
